name: Heat Haze
desc:
Flames ignite around you and create a hazy mirage of you. It has its own AP pool which is equal to yours, can use all your non-spellcasting actions, and shares all current spell effects you have. It can't move away from you and can't take actions that would move it. When it would deal damage, it converts all damage it would deal to fire damage, and it deals half the damage it would normally inflict.

The spell ends if you are reduced to 0 or fewer hit points, or if you come into contact with enough water to soak you completely or take damage from a spell with the Water tag.
author: CrusaderDroid
